download: echo 'deb [arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/vscodium-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.vscodium.com/debs vscodium main'| sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/vscodium.list
sudo apt update && sudo apt install codium
codium.description: Binary release of VS Code without MS branding/telemetry/licensing

nvim.description: Vim-fork focused on extensibility and usability

broot.description: A better way to navigate directories
